name: quadrantica (itch)
description:
Lift one tile up and another goes down. Change one tile’s color, but two others change in turn. The tiles in quadrantica are in a state of disarray - and it’s your job to bring them into order. The moves you make always influence the pieces around you, but never the tile you select: find the optimal solution to this cascade of cause and effect to flood this surreal world with light and color once again.

Game Features
  • 81 brain-teasing puzzles in 9 levels, with challenge levels ranging from friendly to frustrating
  • A half-hour soundtrack of original music
  • No time limits or lives - solve the puzzles at your own pace
Game Controls

- ( left click ) affect block
- ( right click ) switch power
- ( "R" key ) reset field
- ( ESC key ) open menu
